adjust_priors

Source: R/singlevar.R
adjust_priors.Rd

adjust fixed priors when nsnps in region is high

adjust_priors(nsnps, p1 = 1e-04, p2 = 1e-04, p12 = 1e-05, pa = NULL, pc = NULL)

Arguments

nsnps

number of SNPs

p1

prior probability a SNP is associated with trait 1, default 1e-4 (coloc prior)

p2

prior probability a SNP is associated with trait 2, default 1e-4 (coloc prior)

p12

prior probability a SNP is associated with both traits, default 1e-5 (coloc prior)

pa

prior probability that a non-query variant is causally associated with the query trait , default \(pa = p2\) (cophescan prior)

pc

prior probability that the query variant is causally associated with the query trait, default \(pc = p12/p1+p12\) (cophescan prior)

Value

vector of pn, pa and pc adjusted prior probabilities

Contents
